alert.note: Alert for Tacoma Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 22 at 2:10PM PST until December 24 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding possible around high tide on Thursday and Friday mornings. * WHERE...Tacoma Area of Pierce County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding of lots, parks, and roads near the beaches is possible with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High tide at Tacoma is around 8 am Thursday and 9 am Friday. High tides will be around a foot above the tide table predictions Thursday and Friday.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
